CustomField.description: Updated 7/17 per GTMS-1045 to remove Shipping Country check for EU free trial kits
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Industry, "Transportation & Warehousing"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Free Trial Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Non Express'), ISNULL(Account.Free_Trial_Kit_Sent_Date__c), Probability >= 0.95, ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Country__c, "United States") ), "Transport & Warehousing", IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Industry, "Food & Beverage"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Free Trial Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Non Express'), ISNULL(Account.Free_Trial_Kit_Sent_Date__c), Probability >= 0.95, ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Country__c, "United States") ), "Food & Beverage", IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Free Trial Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Non Express'), ISNULL(Account.Free_Trial_Kit_Sent_Date__c), Probability >= 0.95, ISPICKVAL(Shipping_Country__c, "United States") ), "Standard", IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Free Trial Opportunity"), ISPICKVAL(Configuration_Segment__c,'Non Express'), ISNULL(Account.Free_Trial_Kit_Sent_Date__c), Probability >= 0.95 ), "FREE-TRIAL-KIT-EU", "" ))))
CustomField.label: Free Trial Kit Type
